additional_requirement: Focus on cases involving health and safety claims.
Discuss the impact on public health and compliance challenges.
Include discussions on controversies and health impact studies.
Focus on major documented attacks and their implications on national security.
Discuss known state-sponsored activities and global responses.
Focus on scenarios and prevention strategies.
Explore case studies involving significant social or political outcomes.
Discuss influence on drug approval processes and public health policy.
Include discussions on current research and key challenges in the field.
